name: single-spa-portal-example-frame
description: Portal app that builds the foundation of multiple SPAs

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ../app1React && npm run watch:portal" "cd ../app2Angular && npm run watch:portal" "cd ../app3Angular1 && npm run watch:portal" "cd ../app4vue && npm run watch:portal" "cd ../app5Angular && npm run watch:portal" "cd ../angular-app-cli && npm run watch:portal" "webpack-dev-server --port 9000"

author: Michael Ruecker
